commit.message:
8336029: [lworld] Rename Objects.isIdentity() to hasIdentity()
Also, remove java.util.Objects.isValueObject and replace with !hasIdentity().
Align the default WeakValuePolicy of WeakHashMap with that of references.
Namely, throw IdentityException unless the WeakHashMap is created with a different policy.
WeakHashMapPolicy is a unsupported API for exploration.
